mapper.select: select c.MTR_SEQ, MTR_PROFILE, MTR_SUBJECT, MTR_HASHTAG,MTR_PRICE, mdi.MTRDI_SEQ, MTRDI_STIME, MTRDI_ETIME, MEM_POINT, CT_SEQ from MENTORING mtr, MENTORING_DETAIL_INFO mdi, CART c, MEMBER m where c.MEM_EMAIL = #{mem_email} and m.MEM_EMAIL = #{mem_email} and c.MTR_SEQ = mtr.MTR_SEQ and c.MTRDI_SEQ = mdi.MTRDI_SEQ order by ct_seq
mapper.delete: delete from CART where mem_email=#{mem_email} and ct_seq=#{ct_seq}
